tables.command: sqoop import -Dmapreduce.output.basename={environment}_{table} -Dmapreduce.job.queuename=root.dataeng --connect 'jdbc:oracle:thin:@{serverName}:{port}/{service}'  --username '{username}' --query "SELECT ENTIDAD,CENTRO_ALTA,CUENTA,DIVISA,PRODUCTO,SUBPRODU,PRODUCTO_CONTAB,SUBPRODU_CONTAB,ENTIDAD_CONTAB,CENTRO_CONTAB,SECTOR,COD_RESIDENCIA,MINIBANCO,EMPRESA_GRUPO,PROMOCION,IND_CODBLOQ,IND_INMOVIL,IND_BLOASES,IND_AVISOS,IND_MISCELA,IND_MANCOMU,IND_PER_FISJUR,IND_COMI_ESPE,IND_CTA_ALTERNA,IND_ACT_PAS,IND_LCA,IND_COBERTURA,IND_CTA_MAD,IND_LCA_ASO,DIV_POSICIONA,IND_SOBREGIRO,ESTADO_BLOQ_CUP,IND_BLOQ_INDUCIDO,IND_CTAESP,IND_COBRO_IMP,IND_CTA_DEP,IND_EMBARGADA,IND_CTA_INACTIVA,CASE WHEN NUMER_MOV < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS numer_mov_sgn,lpad(abs(NUMER_MOV),9,'0') AS NUMER_MOV,CASE WHEN numer_ret < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS numer_ret_sgn, lpad(abs(numer_ret), 5,'0') AS numer_ret,CASE WHEN cnt_gir_period < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS cnt_gir_period_sgn, lpad(abs(cnt_gir_period),5,'0') AS cnt_gir_period,CASE WHEN secuimp < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS secuimp_sgn, lpad(abs(secuimp), 5, '0') AS secuimp,to_char(FECHA_ULTOPE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as FECHA_ULTOPE,to_char(FECHA_ULTOPI, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as FECHA_ULTOPI,to_char(FECHA_ULTOPE_INAC, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as FECHA_ULTOPE_INAC,to_char(FECHA_PENULTRE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as FECHA_PENULTRE,to_char(FECHA_VTOCAMP, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as FECHA_VTOCAMP,to_char(FECHA_VCTO, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as FECHA_VCTO,IND_LIBPERD,IND_SOPORTE,CASE WHEN LINEA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS LINEA_sgn, lpad(abs(LINEA), 2, '0') AS linea,CASE WHEN pagina < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS pagina_sgn, lpad(abs(pagina), 2, '0') AS pagina,DIVISA_BIS,NUM_DEC_DIV,CODIGO_UR,NUM_DEC_UR,CAMPANIA,CASE WHEN NUM_CONVENIO < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS NUM_CONVENIO_sgn, lpad(abs(NUM_CONVENIO), 7, '0') AS NUM_CONVENIO,PLAN_COMI,CASE WHEN porc_bonif_mant < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS porc_bonif_mant_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(porc_bonif_mant)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS porc_bonif_mant,CASE WHEN porc_bonif_proc < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS porc_bonif_proc_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(porc_bonif_proc)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS porc_bonif_proc,CTA_ENTIDAD,CTA_CENTRO,CTA_CUENTA,CENTRO_APERT,TIPO_CAMBIO,CASE WHEN limite < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS limite_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(limite)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS limite,CASE WHEN cupo_canje < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS cupo_canje_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(cupo_canje)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS cupo_canje,CASE WHEN cupo_remesas < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS cupo_remesas_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(cupo_remesas)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS cupo_remesas,CASE WHEN saldo_dispue < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS saldo_dispue_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(saldo_dispue)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS saldo_dispue,CASE WHEN saldo_impago < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS saldo_impago_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(saldo_impago)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS saldo_impago,CASE WHEN saldo_retenc < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS saldo_retenc_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(saldo_retenc)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS saldo_retenc,CASE WHEN saldo_retenc_liq < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS saldo_retenc_liq_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(saldo_retenc_liq)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS saldo_retenc_liq,CASE WHEN saldo_canje < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS saldo_canje_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(saldo_canje)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS saldo_canje,CASE WHEN saldo_remesas < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS saldo_remesas_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(saldo_remesas)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS saldo_remesas,CASE WHEN saldo_dia < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS saldo_dia_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(saldo_dia)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS saldo_dia,CASE WHEN debe_dia < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS debe_dia_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(debe_dia)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS debe_dia,CASE WHEN exce_maximo < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS exce_maximo_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(exce_maximo)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS exce_maximo,CASE WHEN EXCE_VENTAN < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS EXCE_VENTAN_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(EXCE_VENTAN)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS EXCE_VENTAN,CASE WHEN EXCE_DOMICI < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS 	EXCE_DOMICI_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(EXCE_DOMICI)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS EXCE_DOMICI,CASE WHEN EXCE_CAJERO < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS EXCE_CAJERO_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(EXCE_CAJERO)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS EXCE_CAJERO,CASE WHEN EXCE_COMPRA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS EXCE_COMPRA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(EXCE_COMPRA)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS EXCE_COMPRA,CASE WHEN DISP_TOTAL_ACU < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS DISP_TOTAL_ACU_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(DISP_TOTAL_ACU)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS DISP_TOTAL_ACU,CASE WHEN SALDO_PRESENT < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_PRESENT_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_PRESENT)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_PRESENT,CASE WHEN SALDO_RET_PREC < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_RET_PREC_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_RET_PREC)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_RET_PREC,CASE WHEN SALDO_RET_48 < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_RET_48_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_RET_48)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_RET_48,CASE WHEN SALDO_RET_72 < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_RET_72_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_RET_72)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_RET_72,CASE WHEN SALDO_RET_HOY < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_RET_HOY_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_RET_HOY)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_RET_HOY,CASE WHEN SALDO_RET_HOY_CH < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_RET_HOY_CH_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_RET_HOY_CH)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_RET_HOY_CH,INDESTA,INDSITU_OB,INDSITU_SU,INDSITU_IN,CASE WHEN saldo_dispue_ca < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS saldo_dispue_ca_sgn,		 lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(saldo_dispue_ca)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS saldo_dispue_ca,		 CASE WHEN saldo_dispue_cc < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS saldo_dispue_cc_sgn,lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(saldo_dispue_cc)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS saldo_dispue_cc,ind_posic_cta,ENTIDAD_UMO,CENTRO_UMO,USERID_UMO,NETNAME_UMO,TIMEST_UMO FROM mviews.bgdtmae WHERE as_of_date=date'{partition_date}' AND \$CONDITIONS" --target-dir '{data_lake_server}{landing_path}/partition_date={partition_date}'  --num-mappers 6  --split-by '{split_field}'  --fields-terminated-by '^' --hive-delims-replacement ' ' --password '{password}'  --delete-target-dir --bindir '{zonda_dir}/sqoop/{database}/{table}'  --verbose --null-string '' --null-non-string ''

sqoop import -Dmapreduce.output.basename={environment}_{table} -Dmapreduce.job.queuename=root.dataeng --connect 'jdbc:oracle:thin:@{serverName}:{port}/{service}'  --username '{username}' --query "SELECT ENTIDAD,CENTRO_ALTA,CUENTA,DIVISA,TIPO_VTO,CASE WHEN num_vto < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS num_vto_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(num_vto)),'.',''), 3, '0') AS num_vto,UNI_NEGOCIO,PERIODO_LIQ,CASE WHEN DIANATU_LIQ < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS DIANATU_LIQ_sgn,		 DIANATU_LIQ,FECHA_ULTLIQ,FECHA_PROLIQ,CASE WHEN FRANQUIC < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS FRANQUIC_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(FRANQUIC)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS FRANQUIC,TIPO_LIQ,METOD_LIQ,SALDO_LIQ,DIAS_LIQ,CLASE_LIQ,TARIFA,CASE WHEN TIPOINT_POS < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS TIPOINT_POS_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(TIPOINT_POS)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS TIPOINT_POS,CASE WHEN TIPOINT_neg < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS TIPOINT_neg_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(TIPOINT_neg)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS TIPOINT_neg,CASE WHEN TIPOINT_EXC < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS TIPOINT_EXC_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(TIPOINT_EXC)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS TIPOINT_EXC,COEFICI_POS,CASE WHEN PUNTOS_POS < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PUNTOS_POS_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PUNTOS_POS)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS PUNTOS_POS,COEFICI_NEG,CASE WHEN PUNTOS_NEG < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PUNTOS_NEG_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PUNTOS_NEG)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS PUNTOS_NEG,COEFICI_EXC,CASE WHEN PUNTOS_EXC < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PUNTOS_EXC_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PUNTOS_EXC)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS PUNTOS_EXC,CODRED,PERIODO_TAR,to_char(FECHA_ULTCAM, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as FECHA_ULTCAM,CASE WHEN tipoint_inc < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS tipoint_inc_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(tipoint_inc)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS tipoint_inc,CASE WHEN refer_liq < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS refer_liq_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(refer_liq)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS refer_liq,CLASE_TAF,CASE WHEN TIPOINT_INC_SBRG < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS TIPOINT_INC_SBRG_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(TIPOINT_INC_SBRG)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS TIPOINT_INC_SBRG,to_char(FECHA_PREAPE, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_ALTA, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_IMPAGA, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_BLOQUEO, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_INMOVIL, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_CANCEL, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_CIERRE, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_RENOVA, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_ULTREAJU, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_PROREAJU, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_PER_REA, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_INICIALI, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_PROC_LIQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_UPRO_LIQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_CAP_LIQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_EXCEDI, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_PRI_EXCE, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_ALT_ACU, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_ULT_PER, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_ULTSO, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_ULTSS, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),to_char(FECHA_ULTSI, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),CASE WHEN CNT_CARTOLA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_CARTOLA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_CARTOLA)),'.',''), 3, '0') AS CNT_CARTOLA,CASE WHEN CNT_SERV_FAX < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_SERV_FAX_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_SERV_FAX)),'.',''), 3, '0') AS CNT_SERV_FAX,CASE WHEN CNT_MOVIM_FAX < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_MOVIM_FAX_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_MOVIM_FAX)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CNT_MOVIM_FAX,CASE WHEN CNT_PROTESTOS < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_PROTESTOS_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_PROTESTOS)),'.',''), 3, '0') AS CNT_PROTESTOS,CASE WHEN CNT_ACLARA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_ACLARA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_ACLARA)),'.',''), 3, '0') AS CNT_ACLARA,CASE WHEN CNT_BLOQ_CUPO < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_BLOQ_CUPO_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_BLOQ_CUPO)),'.',''), 3, '0') AS CNT_BLOQ_CUPO,CASE WHEN CNT_DIA_CUPO_DES < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_DIA_CUPO_DES_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_DIA_CUPO_DES)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CNT_DIA_CUPO_DES,CASE WHEN CNT_DIA_USO_EXCE < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_DIA_USO_EXCE_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_DIA_USO_EXCE)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CNT_DIA_USO_EXCE,PCO_ECU_PER,PCO_ECU_SOP,PCO_ECU_FHPR,PCO_COP_IND,CASE WHEN PCO_COP_ULMO < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PCO_COP_ULMO_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PCO_COP_ULMO)),'.',''), 9, '0') AS PCO_COP_ULMO,PCO_COP_ULCO,CASE WHEN PCO_COP_HOJA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PCO_COP_HOJA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PCO_COP_HOJA)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS PCO_COP_HOJA,CASE WHEN PCO_SALDO_ULEX < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PCO_SALDO_ULEX_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PCO_SALDO_ULEX)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS PCO_SALDO_ULEX,CASE WHEN PCO_NUM_MOV < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PCO_NUM_MOV_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PCO_NUM_MOV)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS PCO_NUM_MOV,PCO_IND_DESTINO,ENVCART_SINMOV,MOTIVO_CANCEL,MOTIVO_REAPER,CASE WHEN TASA_MIN_GARAN < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS TASA_MIN_GARAN_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(TASA_MIN_GARAN)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS TASA_MIN_GARAN,TASA_MAX_CONV,CASE WHEN PORC_AMOR_LCA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PORC_AMOR_LCA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PORC_AMOR_LCA)),'.',''), 8, '0') AS PORC_AMOR_LCA,PER_AMOR_LCA,SUCURSAL_FISICA,CASE WHEN PRIORIDAD_ACU < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PRIORIDAD_ACU_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PRIORIDAD_ACU)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS PRIORIDAD_ACU,CASE WHEN IMP_MIN_TRASP < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS IMP_MIN_TRASP_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(IMP_MIN_TRASP)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS IMP_MIN_TRASP,CASE WHEN SALDO_MIN_LCA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_MIN_LCA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_MIN_LCA)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_MIN_LCA,CASE WHEN SALDO_MIN_CTA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_MIN_CTA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_MIN_CTA)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_MIN_CTA,GARANTIA,CASE WHEN SALDO_UR_ULT < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_UR_ULT_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_UR_ULT)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_UR_ULT,CASE WHEN SALDO_ULIQ_VA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_ULIQ_VA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_ULIQ_VA)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_ULIQ_VA,PER_ABO_REAJU,CASE WHEN DIAS_DESP_PRO < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS DIAS_DESP_PRO_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(DIAS_DESP_PRO)),'.',''), 2, '0') AS DIAS_DESP_PRO,CASE WHEN DIAS_DESP_CAP < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS DIAS_DESP_CAP_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(DIAS_DESP_CAP)),'.',''), 2, '0') AS DIAS_DESP_CAP,IND_TIPODIA,CASE WHEN INTE_DEVACRE < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS INTE_DEVACRE_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(INTE_DEVACRE)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS INTE_DEVACRE,CASE WHEN INTE_DEVDEUD < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS INTE_DEVDEUD_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(INTE_DEVDEUD)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS INTE_DEVDEUD,CASE WHEN INTE_DEVEXCE < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS INTE_DEVEXCE_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(INTE_DEVEXCE)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS INTE_DEVEXCE,CASE WHEN REAJU_DEVENG < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS REAJU_DEVENG_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(REAJU_DEVENG)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS REAJU_DEVENG,IND_57_BIS,IND_LIQ_NORMAL,IND_LIQ_TASAFIN,IND_ISR,IND_PAQUETE,IND_PIVOTE,IND_PET_LIQ,IND_BONIFICA,IND_EXCAUTO,IND_RENAUTO,IND_SORTEO,IND_FANTASIA,IND_SEG_PR_CAMARA,IND_ACU_AHORRO,IND_LIQUIDA_PROMO,CASE WHEN ULT_NUM_CHEQ < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS ULT_NUM_CHEQ_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(ULT_NUM_CHEQ)),'.',''), 9, '0') AS ULT_NUM_CHEQ,IND_BLOQ_ENTRE,MOTIVO_BLOQ,CASE WHEN STOCK_TLN < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS STOCK_TLN_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(STOCK_TLN)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS STOCK_TLN,CASE WHEN CONT_ONP < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CONT_ONP_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CONT_ONP)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CONT_ONP,CASE WHEN CHQ_RECH_FONDO < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CHQ_RECH_FONDO_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CHQ_RECH_FONDO)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CHQ_RECH_FONDO,CASE WHEN CHQ_RECH_FORMA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CHQ_RECH_FORMA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CHQ_RECH_FORMA)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CHQ_RECH_FORMA,CASE WHEN CHQ_RECH_ONP < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CHQ_RECH_ONP_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CHQ_RECH_ONP)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CHQ_RECH_ONP,CASE WHEN CNT_CHQ_GIR_M < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_CHQ_GIR_M_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_CHQ_GIR_M)),'.',''), 7, '0') AS CNT_CHQ_GIR_M,CASE WHEN CNT_CHQ_DEVU_M < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_CHQ_DEVU_M_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_CHQ_DEVU_M)),'.',''), 3, '0') AS CNT_CHQ_DEVU_M,CASE WHEN CNT_CHQ_GIR_MA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_CHQ_GIR_MA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_CHQ_GIR_MA)),'.',''), 7, '0') AS CNT_CHQ_GIR_MA,CASE WHEN  CNT_CHQ_DEVU_MA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_CHQ_DEVU_MA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_CHQ_DEVU_MA)),'.',''), 3, '0') AS CNT_CHQ_DEVU_MA,CASE WHEN CNT_SINFON_COMP < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_SINFON_COMP_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_SINFON_COMP)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CNT_SINFON_COMP,CASE WHEN CNT_SINFON_NOCOMP < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_SINFON_NOCOMP_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_SINFON_NOCOMP)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CNT_SINFON_NOCOMP,CASE WHEN CNT_FORMA_LIBRADOR < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_FORMA_LIBRADOR_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_FORMA_LIBRADOR)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CNT_FORMA_LIBRADOR,CASE WHEN CNT_ONP_LIBRADOR < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS CNT_ONP_LIBRADOR_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(CNT_ONP_LIBRADOR)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS CNT_ONP_LIBRADOR,SUCURSAL_ENT,CASE WHEN DOMICILIO_ENT < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS DOMICILIO_ENT_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(DOMICILIO_ENT)),'.',''), 3, '0') AS DOMICILIO_ENT,TIPO_TLN_STNDR,CASE WHEN NUM_LIB < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS NUM_LIB_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(NUM_LIB)),'.',''), 9, '0') AS NUM_LIB,CASE WHEN SALDO_LIBRET < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_LIBRET_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_LIBRET)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_LIBRET,CASE WHEN MOV_ACTLIB < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS MOV_ACTLIB_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(MOV_ACTLIB)),'.',''), 9, '0') AS MOV_ACTLIB,TERM_ACTLIB,CASE WHEN OPER_ACTLIB < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS OPER_ACTLIB_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(OPER_ACTLIB)),'.',''), 5, '0') AS OPER_ACTLIB,FCHA_ACTLIB,HORA_ACTLIB,MOTIVO_ASIG_LIB,CASE WHEN SALDO_ULIQ_VA_CA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_ULIQ_VA_CA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_ULIQ_VA_CA)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_ULIQ_VA_CA,CASE WHEN SALDO_ULIQ_VA_CC < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS SALDO_ULIQ_VA_CC_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(SALDO_ULIQ_VA_CC)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS SALDO_ULIQ_VA_CC,CASE WHEN PCO_SALDO_ULEX_CA < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PCO_SALDO_ULEX_CA_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PCO_SALDO_ULEX_CA)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS PCO_SALDO_ULEX_CA,CASE WHEN PCO_SALDO_ULEX_CC < 0 THEN '-' ELSE '+' END AS PCO_SALDO_ULEX_CC_sgn, lpad(REPLACE(to_char(abs(PCO_SALDO_ULEX_CC)),'.',''), 15, '0') AS PCO_SALDO_ULEX_CC,ENTIDAD_UMO,CENTRO_UMO,USERID_UMO,NETNAME_UMO,TIMEST_UMO FROM mviews.bgdtaux WHERE as_of_date=date'{partition_date}' AND \$CONDITIONS" --target-dir '{data_lake_server}{landing_path}/partition_date={partition_date}'  --num-mappers 6  --split-by '{split_field}'  --fields-terminated-by '^' --hive-delims-replacement ' ' --password '{password}'  --delete-target-dir --bindir '{zonda_dir}/sqoop/{database}/{table}'  --verbose --null-string '' --null-non-string ''
